channel.title: Invalid Names Problem. HELP!

item.title: Invalid Names Problem. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Ok I’m having an issue with blocking invalid names. I block them perfectly fine. They cannot log in and it says they’re automatically banned. But If someone logs in with like “test!@!@!”, it won’t log them on but it still saves a character file for them along with a moreinfo, connectedfrom, etc. How can I stop this? Here the code:

for(char c : playerName.toCharArray()) { if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(c)) { if(Character.isSpaceChar(c)) continue; out.write(4); checkbannedusers(); disconnected = true; savefile = false; } }

I thought save = false would fix it but it didn’t. Help?

Read full topic
